homePage.title: Frontline meals
homePage.text: KUKHARSKYI VULYK is a group of loyal, hard-working, genuine and benevolent enthusiasts, united to help Armed Forces hold the lines. We prepare MREs and deliver them to the front line free of charge so that everyone out there, keeping watch and defending our integrity, has an opportunity to savour nutritious and delicious meals.
homePage.textSecondParagraph: Our team consists of over 30 people. We gather ingredients, diligently sort and prepare them for further processing; then dry everything, do a quality check and lastly make packed portions. All this in order to create wholesome meals that can make cooking easier for our soldiers.

formCallBack.title: Call back
formCallBack.text: Please enter your name and phone number. We will contact you soon
formCallBack.name: Name
formCallBack.errorName: Name may contain only letters, apostrophe, dash and spaces.The minimum number of characters is 3, the maximum is 20
formCallBack.errorPhone: Phone number must be digits and can contain spaces, dashes, parentheses and can start with +

charityPage.charityText: KUKHARSKYI VULYK operates on volunteering basis, all electricity bills are paid by team members from their own pocket and 100% donations are spent explicitly on packaging, spices, meat, meals’ ingredients and shipment.
charityPage.callToAction: If you want to support us financially, our bank details are:
charityPage.vegitables: Vegetables: cabbages, carrots, beetroots, onions, green, garlic, beans, sweet peppers, tomatoes, champignons and forest mushrooms.
charityPage.fruits: Fruits and berries of all kinds, including frozen.
charityPage.porridge: Cereals: rice, pearl barley, oat flakes, buckwheat, 'cobweb' pasta.
charityPage.otherProducts: Other ingredients: milk powder, sugar, salt, raisins, honey, nuts, dried fruits, dried broth/bouillon cubes, canned green peas, peanut paste.

teamPage.title: Hello, friend!
teamPage.aboutFirstPart: We’re excited to welcome you on KUHARSKYI VULYK’s secret page! Here you can become acknowledged with the whole team of “bees” working on this site.
teamPage.aboutSecondPart: Also, don’t forget to review our social media and portfolio. We will be glad to see you in our contact lists.
teamPage.aboutThirdPart: We’d like to say “thank you” to
teamPage.aboutFourthPart: company, who gathered all of us to create this incredible project!
